cz.opendata.tenderstats

Class Geocoder.GeoProviderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.opendata.tenderstats.Geocoder.GeoProviderFactory
  • Enclosing class:
    Geocoder

    public static class Geocoder.GeoProviderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for creating GeoProviders from online HTTP services with supported output formats.
    Author:
    Matej Snoha

    • Nested Class Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Geocoder.GeoProvider defaultProvider
      Default GeoProvider
      static Geocoder.GeoProvider googleMaps
      Google Maps GeoProvider
      https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/geocoding/
      Limit 2500 requests / ip / day
      static Geocoder.GeoProvider local
      Local Gisgraphy instance with data from GeoNames and OpenStreetMap.
      No enforced limits.
      static Geocoder.GeoProvider nominatim
      OpenStreetMap Nominatim GeoProvider
      https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Nominatim
      Bulk limit : 1 / second

    • Method Detail

      • createXMLGeoProvider

        public static Geocoder.GeoProvider createXMLGeoProvider(java.lang.String requestURL,
                                        java.lang.String latitudeXPath,
                                        java.lang.String longitudeXPath,
                                        int requestsPerSecond)
        Constructs a Provider with XML output from given arguments
        Parameters:
        requestURL - URL of service, query string will be appended at the end.
        latitudeXPath - XPath of latitude in response from web service.
        longitudeXPath - XPath of longitude in response from web service.
        requestsPerSecond - Maximum number of requests per second. Set to 0 to disable rate limiting.
